contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|berserker|berserk}} A '''[[berserker]]''' is a Norse warrior who fights with great rage. '''Berserker''' or '''berzerker''' may refer to: In '''fiction''': *[[Berserker probe]], a hypothetical variant of the Von Neumann probe that has been deliberately (or inadvertently) designed to sterilize life and life-bearing exoplanets *[[Berserker (Saberhagen)]], a space opera series of Fred Saberhagen about autonomous spaceships programmed to kill all life *[[Berzerker (comics)]], a member of the Morlocks and the Tunnelers in the Marvel comics universe *[[Berserker (comics)]], a comic book series by Top Cow *[[Berserker (Fate/stay night)]], a character in the computer game and anime ''Fate/stay night'' *[[Berserker (Fate/Zero)]], a character in the novel ''Fate/Zero'' *[[List of characters in the Soul series#Berserker|Berserker]], a bonus character from the video game Soulcalibur II *[[Khorne]] Bezerkers, powerful close combat units in ''Warhammer 40,000'' *[[Berserker (character class)]], a character class in a number of role-playing games *Berserker, a card in the video games ''[[Lost Kingdoms]]'' and ''Lost Kingdoms II'' *Berserkers, a feral breed of monsters in the film ''[[Nightbreed]]'' *[[List_of_ThunderCats_characters#Hammerhand and the Berserkers|Berserkers]], a group of recurring minor villains in the animated television series [[Thundercats]] *Berserker, a female from the Locust Horde in the ''[[Gears of War series]]'' On '''screen''': *[[Berserker (1987 film)|''Berserker'' (1987 film)]], a "slasher" horror film *[[Berserker (2004 film)|''Berserker'' (2004 film)]], a film based on the Norse concept of the berserker *"[[The Mark of the Berserker]]", a two-part story in ''The Sarah Jane Adventures'' In '''music''': *[[The Berzerker]], a grindcore/industrial metal band from Australia *[[Berserker (Scratch Acid album)|''Berserker'' (Scratch Acid album)]], a 1986 EP by noise rock band Scratch Acid *[[Berserker (Jane album)|''Berserker'' (Jane album)]], the third album by experimental group Jane *[[Berserker (Gary Numan album)|''Berserker'' (Gary Numan album)]], a 1984 album, the first Numan album to be released under his self-employed record label *"Berserker", a metal song by Love Among Freaks from the [[Clerks (soundtrack)|''Clerks'' soundtrack]] *"[[Bärsärkar marsch]]", a song by [[Dia Psalma]] *[[Berserkers (Black Label Society song)|"Berserkers" (Black Label Society song)]], a song by Black
